item.title: About Sources
item.description: up:: [[Meta PKM]] The beast-like Evernote Web Clipper approaches Gandalf trying to infect and corrupt your PKM sanctuary with hordes of low-value articles you’ll never read and that will drown your own thinking a pit of orc-like chaos.

item.title: About Cards
item.description: up:: [[Meta PKM]] The cards folder is one of my favorite places because it has umami. Apparently umami is one of the five basic tastes.

item.title: About Encounters
item.description: up:: [[Meta PKM]] About Encounters This is a space to store notes as you capture them. Have a fresh idea that you want to reassess in a few days to see if it’s still exciting?
